name: Samuel Jackson
title: Refund request for overage charges on EC2 free tier
message:
Good morning AWS support, I am writing this letter to appeal regarding my recent charges on EC2. I am currently utilizing AWS services as a student. Though I was informed about the charges on certain AWS services, I didn't realize that I was continuously being charged while the services were running. I would like to plead with you for a one time waiver of the charges. I have ensured that all running SERVICES have been stopped. 

I sincerely appreciate the SERVICES you provide and would be happy to resume utilizing them with better awareness. 
Name of the Service: AWS EC2 Instances.
Total Amount: 158.00.
Time Frame( in Days, Weeks and Months): Feb 28 to March 28

name: Samuel Jackson
title: Refund request for overage charges on EC2 free tier

name: Samuel Oluwade
title: I need help
message: Hi there, I'm just a lazy developer.
